snippet.title: Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
NO REST ‘TIL DAWN!

Welcome to Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn – where magic and gunpowder collide and unite in an epic battle to defeat the Gods.

Join Nor and her mysterious fox-like companion, Enki, as they unite against the old Gods to free the besieged lands of Kian. Traverse deserts, ruins, and towering cities in a pursuit of vengeance and freedom.

Tailor your gameplay with an extensive array of skills, weapons, and gear. Delve into intricate skill trees that include Combat Skills for enhancing melee and ranged attacks, Magic Abilities to harness arcane power, and Companion Abilities to boost Enki’s support in battle. Craft and upgrade your arsenal, mastering a blend of physical and magical prowess. Dive into side quests and explore the world to discover hidden collectibles, gear, and crafting materials to enhance Nor's equipment.

Flintlock: The Siege of Dawn is out now. Prepare to confront the relentless fury of the Gods.

Find out more: playflintlock.com/linkhub
